typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> source1
source1 derive(id = substring(Column_1, 0, 4),
		name = substring(Column_1, 5, 10),
		transcation_no = substring(Column_1, 15)) ~> DerivedColumn1
DerivedColumn1 select(mapColumn(
		id,
		name,
		transcation_no
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(input(
		Credit_ID as string,
		Card_Type as string,
		Credit_Name as string,
		Credit_Score as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['fixedsizefileoutput.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
